detectors.description:
PolkaCoin.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#268-273) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#270)
detectors.markdown:

	-[newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#L270)
